meanings.definition: A system of organizing or arranging in layers or levels.
meanings.sent1: The tiering of the cake made it look elegant and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The tiering of the seating arrangement helped everyone see the stage.
meanings.sent3: The tiering of the shelves in the store made it easier for customers to find what they needed.
meanings.sent4: The tiering of responsibilities in the team made sure everyone knew their role.
meanings.sent5: The tiering of the garden with different plants created a stunning visual effect.

meanings.definition: The act of creating tiers or levels.
meanings.sent1: Her tiering of the cupcakes for the party was meticulous and impressive.
meanings.sent2: The tiering of the awards ceremony made the winners feel special.
meanings.sent3: His tiering of the Lego blocks resulted in a unique and colorful structure.
meanings.sent4: The tiering of the competition prizes added excitement for the participants.
meanings.sent5: The tiering of the bookshelves by genre made it easier to find specific titles.

meanings.definition: The process of categorizing or ranking in levels.
meanings.sent1: The tiering of the students based on their skills helped the teachers plan better.
meanings.sent2: The tiering of the athletes according to their performance ensured fair competition.
meanings.sent3: The tiering of the products by popularity made shopping more efficient.
meanings.sent4: The tiering of the job applicants by experience simplified the hiring process.
meanings.sent5: The tiering of the music genres at the festival catered to diverse tastes.
